data.title: Yo-Kai Watch - Season 3: Episode 23
data.meta_description: Carl SanFantastico's biggest heist begins, and the Hapyon Detectives are more determined than ever to catch their man! A new Yo-kai makes Katie frighteningly bossy, and Nate is going to need all the help he can get to put a stop to it. But one isn't enough, and a second Yo-kai shows up to cause trouble, turning everyone around Nate into shameless cheaters! How can he put a stop to this Yo-kai conman?
